Koch Industries, Inc. All rights reserved.

On any given day, our businesses make heat-resistant polymers to help build your car’s engine, fluffy fiberfill for your favorite pillow, fibers for the elastic bands in baby diapers, recycled polyester for the soles on your next pair of shoes, and countless other items.

Masters of multitasking.

We own hundreds of unique patents and focus on innovations for Apparel & Advanced Textiles, Intermediates, Performance Solutions and Performance Technologies. There’s a good chance that you know some of our brands. See a full list here.

Featured Brands

Clothes made with LYCRA® fiber are comfortable, durable and keep their fit. LYCRA.com

America’s most trusted carpet brand. STAINMASTER.com

Fabric that wicks moisture for athletic performance and everyday comfort. COOLMAX.com

Ambition To Reality

Big ideas are just the beginning. The real challenge is putting them in motion.

Reporting for Heavy Duty

JD has depended on CORDURA® fiber while serving his country in Bosnia, Afghanistan and Iraq. Now he helps put it through extreme tests for new military uniforms.

Jerry

VP Technology & R&D

Making it better

How our team at Koch went all in to eliminate benzene from the production of a miracle substance we all use.

Cultivating Environmental Education

We are using water from our facility in Victoria, Texas, to create a flourishing ecosystem for thousands of students to study.

Just like our businesses, the career opportunities at INVISTA are diverse.

Invista

Food. Shelter. Clothing. Transportation. Koch Industries creates life’s basic necessities, while innovating ways to make them even better. Yet our advocacy for a free and open society is what truly sets us apart.
